attributes.action: Put a city between London and Newcastle on the BBC weather!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the weather forecast on the BBC, we see just an open space between London and Newcastle apart from the occasional Birmingham. Can we not just have one city in between. Eg. Sheffield? Just so people will be able to know and locate themselves better on the weather forecast. Thankyou.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
